attributes.action: Arrest PM Boris Johnson for unlawfully proroguing parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
Paragraph 62 of Supreme Court official statement 
https://www.supremecourt.uk/cases/docs/uksc-2019-0192-judgment.pdf
attributes.background: On 24/09/2019, the Supreme Court ruled that the advice given to the Queen to prorogue parliament for 5 weeks was “unlawful”. The prime minister who gave said advice should therefore be charged and placed under arrest for their “unlawful” acts.
